Description: Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars!!! shipping to the lower 48 states only.I will not ship anywhere else.Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars at my ebay store "Axes Bold As Love Guitars". Here is a very cool Slammer by Hamer Double Cutaway LP Special type guitar with some nice upgrades. I installed a set of Hamer pickups that I had from a more expensive Hamer guitar and upgraded the capacitor with an Orange Drop style epoxy film capacitor. The guitar is in good condition but has it's share of nicks. I touched most of the nicks up to make them less noticable. The biggest one is on the right side of the front of the headstock.Guitar plays and sounds great with good action. A classy looking guitar that wants to kick some butt. Guitar looks great. Please study the pictures to get a better idea of the condition. I only ship fully insured to the lower 48 states,and nowhere else. I describe all guitars to the best of my abilities.I don't take every guitar apart to check every freaking screw.I disclose all pimples just so there are no misunderstandings.All guitars are sold as is. Insurance is included in my shipping and handling charges.I will not ship out of the U.S. My feedback is public record,and I aim to keep it good. I will no longer do local pickups period. Make sure to look at all pictures carefully,ask all question before you bid! All sales are final,and there will be no refunds, or returns unless you can prove an item was grossly misrepresented. Consider this a contract if you bid. Sorry it has to be like that,blame the clever scam artist that spend all their time trying to beat somebody,instead of working. Most deliveries will require adult signature.
